mapper.sql: sys_file_.id AS sys_file_id, sys_file_.`name` AS sys_file_name, sys_file_.suffix AS sys_file_suffix, sys_file_.version AS sys_file_version, sys_file_.code AS sys_file_code, sys_file_.`key` AS sys_file_key, sys_file_.`size` AS sys_file_size, sys_file_.url AS sys_file_url, sys_file_.note AS sys_file_note, sys_file_.check_type AS sys_file_check_type, sys_file_.check_code AS sys_file_check_code, sys_file_.state AS sys_file_state, sys_file_.create_date AS sys_file_create_date, sys_file_.update_date AS sys_file_update_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_file ( name, suffix, version, code, `key`, `size`, url, note, check_type, check_code, state, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now() )
